Question: This person attended Wentworth Primary School with Mick Jagger and was his neighbour until 1954, when the family moved.
Hints: In the 1990s and 2000s this person has continued to contribute to a wide range of musical projects as a guest artist.
This person was tried in October 1978, pleading guilty to possession of heroin.
At this point this person had learned most of Chuck Berry's solos.
